enuActor.Commands package¶

Submodules¶

enuActor.Commands.BiaCmd module¶

class enuActor.Commands.BiaCmd.BiaCmd(actor)[source]¶

Bases: object

bia(cmd)[source]¶

Switch on/off BIA light

init(cmd)[source]¶

Initialise BIA device

set_mode(cmd)[source]¶

Start/Restart BIA device in operation/simulation mode (default operation)

set_state(cmd)[source]¶

Change current BIA state to BUSY, IDLE, LOADED, ...

setconfig(cmd)[source]¶

Change current parameters (in development)

status(cmd)[source]¶

Get status and position of BIA device

strobeByDefault(cmd)[source]¶

Stobe mode with default parameters (in cfg file)

strobe_freq_dur(cmd)[source]¶

Stobe mode with frequency and duration to define

strobe_freq_dur_int(cmd)[source]¶

Stobe mode with intensity, freq. and dur. to define

strobe_int(cmd)[source]¶

Stobe mode with intensity to define

Bases: object

Opens a terminal to communicate directly with device

Read the current magnification value

Move along dither.

goFocus(cmd)[source]¶

Move along focus

goHome(cmd)[source]¶

Move to home value position.

halt(cmd)[source]¶

Not implemented yet. It should stop movement.

init(cmd)[source]¶

Initialise SLIT device

moveTo(cmd)[source]¶

Move to (X, Y, Z, U, V, W) rel. to home if absolute specifiedelse if relative then incremental move. NB: In relative move parameters are optional.

setDither(cmd)[source]¶

Define Dithering axis enabled value are 1, 0 or -1.

setFocus(cmd)[source]¶

Define focus axis enabled value are 1, 0 or -1.

setHome(cmd)[source]¶

Change Home value position

setHomeCurrent(cmd)[source]¶

Define Home value position as the current value position

setMagnification(cmd)[source]¶

Define magnification value

set_mode(cmd)[source]¶

Start/Restart SLIT device in operation/simulation mode (default operation)

set_state(cmd)[source]¶

Change current SLIT state to BUSY, IDLE, LOADED, ...

status(cmd)[source]¶
